name: The Grindstone
description:
To begin your adventure in The Grindstone you need to form a team of 4.
You first pick your race from human, elf, dark-elf, amzar, lizard-folk and other
various monsters.

You then decide a class varying from a heavy armor wearing Warrior, a magic
throwing Wizard, a Ranger covering the battle field with arrows and much more!

You set off into the world with the freedom to take things how you please.
You can help towns, or ignore all of them and just go work on your fishing
abilities.

There's a wide world to explore that's absolutely packed with monsters,
treasure, and quests.

This is a single player RPG
Players can expect over 20 hours of gameplay

*Crafting/Alchemy/FIshing/Mining available
*Veteran Experience System
*Bosses respawn
*Dynamic Battle system
